thread.title: Flavor Flav gets February trial date in traffic case
thread.title_full: Flavor Flav gets February trial date in traffic case

title: Flavor Flav gets February trial date in traffic case
text:
Flavor Flav gets February trial date in misdemeanor Las Vegas DUI, speeding, cocaine case THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   15, 2015 - 9:28 pmLast Updated: October 15, 2015 - 9:29 pm   
Subjects: 
Nevada (378) 

LAS VEGAS — Trial has been postponed to Feb. 8 for entertainer Flavor Flav on misdemeanor driving under the influence, speeding and cocaine charges stemming from a vehicle stop last May in Las Vegas. 
Prosecutors and defense attorney Dayvid Figler said the new date allows time to try to resolve the case against the 56-year-old rapper and reality television star whose name is William Drayton Jr. 
The Nevada Highway Patrol says the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame inductee was clocked going 87 mph in a 65 mph zone. 
Drayton settled criminal charges this week in New York's Nassau County stemming from a traffic stop while racing to his mother's funeral on Long Island. 
He pleaded guilty Tuesday to an unlicensed driver charge, was fined about $3,600 and sentenced to time already served.
